title: Powering the AI revolution: Cisco infrastructure
description: AI’s demands for speed, bandwidth, and energy are stressing organizations and slowing progress. Cisco enables them to capture AI value, securely and efficiently.More RSS Feeds: https://newsroom.cisco.com/c/r/newsroom/en/us/rss-feeds.html
content:
There will be two kinds of companies in the world, said Jeetu Patel, Ciscos president and chief product officer, ones that are really good with AI, and ones that struggle for relevance.
